title: Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton, synthetic, paper
Technique: printed and woven
description: Sample book in blue paper binding with yellow label: Maxine Fabrics, Co. Inc. Finsilver – Koslin. Imported Linens, Novelty Cottons Summer of 1939. Contains 202 samples: 139 linens, 8 printed linens, 6 synthetic printed linens, 20 printed printed cottons, 7 cotton shirtings, 6 novelty cottons; 10 cotton gingham, and 6 cotton piqués.

tombstone.epitaph:
Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: linen, cotton, synthetic, paper
Technique: printed and woven. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-2.
